snippet.title: Dordogne - Release Date Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
https://store.focus-entmt.com/w/dordogne?utm_campaign=Dordogne_ReleaseDateTrailer&utm_medium=description&utm_source=YouTube

Childhood memories linger, and resurface June 13!

Lose yourself in a unique narrative experience with Dordogne as you follow the story of Mimi, a young woman in search of her childhood memories that she has mysteriously forgotten. In an idyllic French countryside setting hand-painted in vibrant pastel watercolors, Mimi explores a world between childhood and adulthood. With your binder you can uniquely recount these vivid memories of Mimi’s family past. Enjoy the first track of the unique music composed by Supernaive, these introspective sounds support the nostalgic and heart-warming journey to Dordogne. This exclusive single is part of Dordogne’s OST that will be released along with the launch of the game.

Dordogne releases June 13 on Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, and PC. Pre-order it now! Sign up as a Focus member now to get the latest info and upcoming exclusive offers for Dordogne and the whole Focus catalog.
